# StructureBuilder.ConfigurationOptions

**Type Alias**

Options that configure a structure builder.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ConfigurationOptions = RoomBuilder.ConfigurationOptions
```

## Discussion

The `options` argument to the [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/StructureBuilder] initializer [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/StructureBuilder/init(options:)] is of this type.

## Creating a structure builder

- **init(options:)**: Creates a structure builder using the specified options.
